name: Teddy (MarcZaf)
description:
"Teddy" is a short platfomer video game. The game is about a Teddy bear roaming inside a boy's mind, facing his nightmares, protecting his dreams. Will it be able to contain these nightmares, or will it consume the boy?

Controls
W,A,S,D - Movement
Space - Jump
C - Contextual Action
K - Attack
ESC - PAUSE
*Game supports Xbox360 gamepad inputs
